short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You spend so much time staring at your computer... doesn't your computer deserve a chance to glance back at you?

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Glance Back is a daily photo diary, capturing the moments shared between you and your computer. Once a day, when you open a new tab, Glance Back will take your photo, ask you what youâ€™re thinking about, and save both the photo and written thought to its locally stored archive.
